blocks.text: Select a pathway to load its flowchart. Toggle compare mode to view both side by side.
Tip: Use left and right arrow keys to move between pathways.
For incidental pituitary lesions detected on CT, MRI, or FDG-PET.

items: Start with the detection modality (CT/MRI vs FDG-PET).
Follow size and mass effect thresholds for surveillance or referral.
Use compare mode to align CT/MRI findings with FDG-PET recommendations.
